name: Highly Recommended
description: Series I personally consider a must read for everyone. This group mainly consists of my favorites

name: Recommended
description: Falls short for a bit compared to Highly Recommended rating, but series under this rating are still very solid

name: Good
description: Balancing itself to keep steady or fell deep down. Usually a step away from being really good or really bad

name: Decent
description: I consider these junk foods. You're getting temporary enjoyment in exchange for long lasting brain rot addiction. Pick your poison

name: Meh
description: Exists for one of three reasons: started out good but fell off hard, good concept but horrible execution, overall disaster, or just my personal feelings involved. Wait, thats four

name: N/A
description: No rating and review yet if the series has less than 50 chapters
